message.content:
{"id": "23787", 
 "title": "Bug 23787 - Project Properties Info page should not use text fields", 
 "description": "Integration build 09/17 - When viewing the Project Properties Info page on motif platforms, the text fields in the form look bad. On motif, these text fields have automatic borders that make them appear as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds which make them stand out even worse.", 
 "OB": "On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders that identify them as user input targets. On Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds.", 
 "EB": "The Project Properties Info page on motif platforms should not use text fields. The appearance of the text fields should be consistent across all platforms.", 
 "SR": "To reproduce the issue: \n1. Select a Project\n2. Right-click and choose Properties\n3. Navigate to the Info page\n\nExpected behavior: The readonly fields (such as Path, Type) should not be displayed as text fields."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '23787', 'title': 'Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties  Info page should not use text fields', 'description': 'Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms. ', 'OB': 'this looks fine on windows, but on motif these text fields all get automaticborders, which identify them as user input targets.Additionally, onSolaris/AIX/HPUX these fields have different coloured backgrounds which makethem stand out much worse ', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'select a Project, rightclickProperties on the subsequent Info page the readonly fields (the values for Path, Type,etc.) '}
